question: Microservices architecture breaks an application into _______ independent services.
Each microservice in an architecture can be developed, deployed, and scaled _______.
In Microservices, communication between services usually happens via _______ protocols.
A microservice typically owns its own _______ to ensure loose coupling.
The concept of microservices is an alternative to _______ architecture.
Service discovery is used in microservices to dynamically find the _______ of services.
Microservices promote _______ deployment and continuous delivery.
API Gateway in microservices acts as a _______ between clients and services.
Microservices architecture improves fault _______ by isolating failures to individual services.
In microservices, the principle of _______ ensures that each service focuses on a specific business capability.
